mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , A.UPLOAD_DATE , A.READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = #{ no }
